summary: ENCHANT is a new series of enchanted items. These are enchanted Rings and Hoods.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/111l56g.jpg[/img]
[b]ABOUT ENCHANT:[/b]
Enchant is a new series of enchanted items, designed to freshen the base game options.

[b]ABOUT RINGS AND HOODS:
[/b]Rings and Hoods is a bunch of rings and . . . hoods.

HOW TO OBTAIN:
Rings can be crafted at any regular forge under the Jewlery or Misc. category. Hoods can be crafted in the Misc. section of a tanning rack.
author: ImmortalTable25
